document_data.name: Dhour
document_data.mainbody:
'''Dhours''' were strange, often-hungry creatures that lived in the [[Astral plane|Astral]] and [[Ethereal plane|Ethereal]] planes.
{{Quote|It was the strangest sight â€“ six of the creatures were clustered together in a ring, pseudopods extended to touch one another like children holding hands. The lights and shapes inside their bodies seemed dim and faint, almost as if the dhours were sleeping. We approached and studied them more closely, but they never acknowledged our presence, and I argued vehemently against attempting to goad them with spell or sword. So, we left and continued on our way.|[[Fayne Storoman]], Clueless priest of [[Faerun]]}}
document_data.Description: Dhours were amoeba-like creatures with translucent, amorphous bodies. The three-lobed brain was visible in the center.
